&reftitle.install;
The PCRE extension is a core PHP extension and is always enabled.
The extension uses a bundled version (by default) of the PCRE2 library. An external PCRE2 library can be used instead by using the --with-external-pcre configuration option. The minimum version supported is 10.30.
PCRE's just-in-time (JIT) compilation is enabled by default. It can be disabled by using the --without-pcre-jit configuration option.
&windows.builtin;
PCRE2 is an active project and as it changes so does the PHP functionality that relies upon it. It is possible that certain parts of the PHP documentation is outdated. For a list of changes, see the PCRE2 library changelog. Also, if using the bundled library, refer to the following bundled PCRE library history:
